content:
During the last day, Russian troops have inflicted 350 beats on ten settlements of Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

The Russian servicemen made three aviation blows along the Mali Tokmachka, Robovin, Temivka and three RSZV-laps of Novodanilovka and Little Tokmachka.

In addition, 36 drones attacked Guliaypole, Levadne, robot, small toxmachka, railway and charming.

308 artudaries on the territory of Guliaypol, Robovy, Malynivka, Small Tokmachka, Novodanylivka, Magic, Temivka and Novodarivka were recorded.

There were 28 reports of destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure. The civilians were not injured.
title: The Russian troops struck 350 beats in the Zaporozhye region a day

author: Army Inform
